title: Discover the Beauty of Jordan This Winter with Four Seasons Hotel Amman's Exclusive Stay Offer
text:
Discover the Beauty of Jordan This Winter with Four Seasons Hotel Amman’s Exclusive Stay Offer
As the cool, gentle breezes of winter arrive, now is the perfect time to experience Jordan in all its glory. As if you needed any other excuse to book a getaway, Four Seasons Hotel Amman, located in the country’s vibrant capital, presents its winter stay offer, ensuring guests enjoy the magic of the season in refined comfort. Throughout your stay, enjoy 20% off the best available room rates, on bookings of two nights or more, and savour the spirit of Jordan through tailored itineraries, exquisite dining, and world-class hospitality that promise to make every stay truly unforgettable.
Perched atop the tallest of Amman’s seven hills, within the lush Abdoun residential district, Four Seasons Hotel Amman is a symbol of timeless elegance and contemporary sophistication. The award-winning property offers a tranquil retreat in the heart of the city, surrounded by a wealth of history and culture. Just a short hop from the ancient wonders of Petra, Wadi Rum, and the rejuvenating waters of the Dead Sea, every journey begins here, where the concierge team is ready to curate bespoke experiences that capture the essence of Jordan.
The hotel is also home to The Spa, where restorative rituals inspired by local traditions and ingredients from the Dead Sea provide ultimate rejuvenation. Guests can unwind in serene surroundings, enjoy a refreshing swim in the indoor pool, or explore the nearby attractions such as the Amman Citadel, an archaeological gem offering panoramic views of the capital. Every detail is designed to create moments of pure relaxation and connection.
Each reservation includes a special touch of Four Seasons hospitality, with a daily selection of gourmet tapas and unlimited beverages at La Capitale Lounge between 3:30 pm and 7:30 pm. La Capitale, the city’s acclaimed French brasserie known for its modern yet classic charm, serves a menu of updated French favourites alongside Jordan’s first farm-to-glass seasonal bar menu. With its fashionable interiors, authentic dishes, and vibrant atmosphere, it’s the perfect setting to unwind, connect, and savour the finest flavours of France right in the heart of Amman.
As winter paints the majestic country of Jordan in golden tones, Four Seasons Hotel Amman welcomes guests to discover the city’s warmth, culture, and elegance through this exclusive offer. Embark on your next cultural escape, romantic getaway, or relaxing retreat, because there’s no better time to experience Jordan’s charm and the exceptional hospitality of Four Seasons than right now.
When: Valid for selected dates from November 5th to December 31st
Offer Inclusions:
20% off the best available room rate (minimum two-night stay required)
Complimentary gourmet tapas and unlimited beverages at La Capitale Lounge daily from 3:30 pm to 7:30 pm
Terms and Conditions:
Offers are subject to availability at the time of booking.
Blackout dates and other restrictions may apply.
Minimum stay of two nights required.
*For more information, visit www.fourseasons.com/amman/offers/discover-amman/ or call +962 6 550 5555
Background Information
Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts
At Four Seasons, we believe in recognizing a familiar face, welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves. Whether you work with us, stay with us, live with us or discover with us, we believe our purpose is to create impressions that will stay with you for a lifetime. It comes from our belief that life is richer when we truly connect to the people and the world around us.
